name: Eliminate Unnecessary Honorifics
description: The Baltic nobility has always prided itself in numerous honorifics and medieval positions which they retain to this day. Hundreds of such honorifics exist, more than there are magnates able to hold them. Sweeping through this list will give the nation a sign that we will not back down from reform.

name: Constitutional Draft Committee
description: The Democratic Party has called for a modern constitution to the Duchy since its inception. It is time to act upon these promises and call a committee of intellectuals who will begin work on a new framework for the state.

name: Permanent Government Commissions
description: Instead of an antiquated fluctuating administration, we should establish permanent commissions in various fields of internal policy, as a temporary alternative to ministries before a new Constitution is adopted.

name: Reform the Landeswehr-Kommission
description: The independence of the Baltische Landeswehr is an anomaly, it was never intended to be so free. We need to curtail its membership and restore the operation of the Landeswehr-Kommission as a full fledged ministry of war, consolidating civilian control over the military.

name: Abolish the Landesprästande
description: Landesprästande, or Land Contributions, is a primitive form of land value tax collected in the Baltic Provinces for several centuries. This tax is no longer adequate in this day and era, it needs to be abolished and replaced by an universal income tax.

name: Alliances with the Rural Communes
description: Autonomous rural communes, the Landgemeinde, are the primary form of rural land organisation outside of manorial estates. We need to support these collectives, institutionalise them, and thus promote equity in the countryside.

name: Alliances with the Landlords
description: Modern, manorial estates employing hundreds of workers are the future, if we seek to increase agricultural efficiency. We must support the landowning barons and grant them concessions to promote production.

name: Land Grants to Returnees
description: Many of our brethren in Germany want to return, but cannot afford to come back because they have nothing to return to. By offering land to returning emigrants, we can ensure a steady trickle back home.

name: Form the Stackelberg-Kommission
description: Heinrich von Stackelberg is one of the most preeminent economists from the Duchy, well known for his research into economics theory and connections with the Freiburg School of liberal economists. To help us combat the Black Monday recession, he offers his services.

name: Implement Anti-Monopoly Laws
description: Stackelberg's policies revolve around maintaining free market principles while ensuring the free market is truly free and fair - most notably by establishing laws against monopolies and trusts in order to increase competitiveness.

name: Progressive Corporate Taxation
description: Under von Stackelberg's guidance, we shall establish a progressive system for corporate taxation to support small businesses and budding firms, grant us more taxation income to distribute to society, and control inflation.

name: Social Security Programs
description: Our nation must give back to the people with wide reaching social programs, instead of storing taxpayer money in safes and vaults. Injecting capital into the economy through social security will make it greatly more vibrant.

name: Independent Monetary Policy
description: To fully remove Black Monday's effects on our economy, we must start pursuing a monetary policy independent of Germany, and thus allow ourselves to manage the value of the Baltic mark according to our needs.

name: National Economic Assistance Commission
description: To ensure the Duchy's economic growth, we must form an instrument to serve as the connection between government and industry - a National Economic Assistance Commission.

name: Guest Worker Programs
description: It is an unfortunate truth that many of our citizens who left for Germany will never return. However, they may be replaced. Even before the Weltkrieg, thousands of Lithuanian, Russian and Polish workers would migrate to Riga and Reval for well paying jobs - this practice, while unpopular, needs to be restored.

name: Combat Anti-Immigrant Sentiment
description: Through propaganda campaigns, we need to ensure that the average Baltic German does not feel threatened by an influx of immigrants from the Reichspakt, and that any fears over losing their jobs are dissuaded.

name: Relief to Returnees
description: By establishing generous handouts to returning emigrants and providing them the support of the state for finding homes or starting businesses, we can ensure a steady stream of returnees from German cities.

name: Public Works
description: The Ducal lands carry a lot of potential, but much of it lay unimproved and uninviting to businesses. Through public works, we can renovate roads, restore decaying factories, and create room for new industries to grow.

name: Industrialisation Priority
description: The way forward in the modern day is a self-sufficient, vibrant industrial economy. Let us go forth and ensure that our children are the first generation beyond the plough.

name: Keggum Hydroelectric Plant
description: The Keggum Hydroelectric Plant, the first hydroelectric plant on the Dunau river, has long since been envisioned as the beating heart of an industrial Baltic society - and we are finally ready to make it operational.

name: Export Agriculture
description: Industrialisation needs to be funded somehow. Let us promote the production of cash crops in the countryside and provide support to farmers in order to boost agricultural production and give us an export advantage.

name: Construct Micro Hydro-Plants
description: Baltic territories hold many rivers fitting for micro-hydropower, enough to potentially make us self-sufficient with electricity. While we'd have to go a long way before accomplishing that, investment into hydropower will yield great dividends to the economy.

name: Estonian Shale Oil Prospects
description: The presence of shale oil, a low grade alternative to oil and gas, in Estonian soil has been known since the 19th century. Only now, however, have we begun to comprehend just how much potential lays in the Estonian plains. Let us go forth and turn Estonia into a second Romania!

name: Walter Zapp's S.E.F.
description: The S.E.F., or State Electronics Factory, is one of the largest industrial complexes in Riga, employing inventors such as Walter Zapp to produce complex electronic machinery, equipment and other hardware. Providing subsidies to this business and seeing it grow will only be beneficial to the state.

name: National Infrastructure Commission
description: The infrastructure of the Duchy remains in poor condition. Roads and railroads need to be renovated, new airfields and ports established, to connect our lands with the rest of Europe and provide the foundation for an industrial economy.

name: Paul Barons' Vairogs
description: Owned by Paul Barons, Vairogs is an automobile production company producing cars, trucks and heavy equipment under civilian and military licenses alike. Subsidising this business will grant our army a critical production partner.

name: Modern Education Programs
description: A state in the twentieth century must employ education programs befitting of its century - old, antiquated education practices must be abolished and a new system built on incentivising merit and achievement, not aristocratic birth.

name: Efficient Industrial Management
description: We must encourage businesses across our country to implement the most state of the art time-saving and resource-efficient technologies and processes, increasing efficiency to unprecedented heights.

name: Abolish Ritter-Schule
description: Ritter-Schule, or Knightly Academies, are private schools operated by the Baltic Knighthoods for the scions of their nobility - they are a haven for reactionary thought and education there falls far below our standards. This antiquated, medieval practice must be put to and end and these schools nationalised.

name: Provide Funding to Friedrich Zander
description: Friedrich Zander is a Baltic inventor and rocket researcher who fled Moscow at the end of the Russian Civil War to settle back in his homeland and continue his work here. While his dream of 'Onwards, to Mars!' is beyond our reach, perhaps there is value to be found in his research into rockets and cruise missiles...

name: Establish Beisitzer-Aufsichtsrat
description: Right now, all Cantons in the Duchy are led by a Church Office Chief with two assessors, a secular and a spiritual one, who form the collective head authority of the Canton. We need to abolish this antiquated system and establish a Beisitzer-Aufsichtsrat in each Canton - a supervisory board of professional assessors appointed by the Church Office Chief.

name: Enforce Meritocratic Appointment
description: No more should the highest bureaucratic offices be distributed by familial ties or noble status. Everyone, as long as they have the skills to do their job, should have a chance to rule the country.

name: Impose Representative Legislatures
description: The popular assemblies in Parishes and Cantons are direct democracies - all noble citizens are required to attend, and pay a fine if they fail to show up. This system no longer works in the 20th century - Parishes and Cantons shall have elections for representatives imposed on each and one of them.

name: Parliamentary Control
description: The Landtag should control the military and the executive government, not the other way around. Grant it the power to appoint and recall chiefs of staff and Chairmans of the Convent, as it should have received a long time ago.

name: Judicial Appointment Commission
description: The Duchy's byzantine judicial system needs to be reformed and new judicial appointments made not with the whim of the Landtag, but by an independent commission of justices and law experts who would pick out impartial and professional judges.

name: Call Constitutional Convention
description: It is about time that the Baltic Duchy finally acquired a permanent Constitution and joined the ranks of modern, constitutional monarchies. Call a Constitutional Convention to finally decide this matter, once and for all!
